subject: Jar file not being loaded
msgSnippet: Hello, I have installed JUnit and included the junit.jar and the installation directory of JUnit in classpath. However whenever i am trying to run the sample
messageBody:
Hello,

I have installed JUnit and included the junit.jar and
the installation directory of JUnit in classpath.
However whenever i am trying to run the sample
testcase AllTests in its sample directory I am having
the following error:
1)testjarClassLoadding<junit.tests.runner.TestCaseClassLoaderTest>java.lang.ClassNotfoundexception:junit.test.runner.LoaderFromJar.

The error basically then talks about being unable to
load because class is not found. I have follwed the
installation procedures and installed at my workplace
but am unable to solve this problem at my home. I
would really appreciate your guidance.

Regards,

Tapan Mehta
